title: Project-Based Instructional Design (ID) Competency Assessment and Development Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational instructional design concepts and experience in learner analysis
context.additional_context: A program for corporate language education managers/leaders to evaluate and enhance instructional design (ID) competencies through project-based learning (PBL) in real-time online collaboration and BYOD environments.

learning_goals: Improve instructional design (Evaluation & Implementation) competencies based on IBSTPI standards by over 80%
Demonstrate integrated problem-solving abilities (design-evaluation-implementation) through project execution using real corporate training cases
Evaluate educational program management competencies through peer feedback and iterative prototyping
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
